mapper.sql: id, type_id, main_para, main_para_type, def_para1, def_para1_type, def_para2, def_para2_type, def_para3, def_para3_type, def_para4, def_para4_type, def_para5, def_para5_type, def_para6, def_para6_type, def_para7, def_para7_type, def_para8, def_para8_type, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version
mapper.select: select t1.code,t1.name,t2.* from sb_type t1 left JOIN sb_type_info t2 on t1.id = t2.type_id WHERE t1.status = '1' and t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sb_type_info (type_id, main_para, main_para_type, def_para1, def_para1_type, def_para2, def_para2_type, def_para3, def_para3_type, def_para4, def_para4_type, def_para5, def_para5_type, def_para6, def_para6_type, def_para7, def_para7_type, def_para8, def_para8_type,create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version) values (#{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mainPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainParaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara2Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara3Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara4Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara5Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara6Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara7Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defPara8Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update sb_type_info set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, main_para = #{mainPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_para_type = #{mainParaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para1 = #{defPara1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para1_type = #{defPara1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para2 = #{defPara2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para2_type = #{defPara2Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para3 = #{defPara3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para3_type = #{defPara3Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para4 = #{defPara4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para4_type = #{defPara4Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para5 = #{defPara5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para5_type = #{defPara5Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para6 = #{defPara6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para6_type = #{defPara6Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para7 = #{defPara7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para7_type = #{defPara7Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para8 = #{defPara8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_para8_type = #{defPara8Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
